name: Các Phòng & Khu Vực Trong Trường (School Areas)

words.example: The students are sitting quietly in the classroom.
You must be quiet when you are in the library.
We do science experiments in the laboratory.
Students play basketball in the gymnasium.
We usually eat lunch in the cafeteria.
The school concert took place in the auditorium.
He was sent to the principal’s office for misbehaving.
The teachers are having a meeting in the staff room.
Children love playing on the slide in the playground.

words.vietnamese: sân vận động, sân thi đấu thể thao
words.example: The soccer match is being held on the playing field.
